articleContent:
Shilang has been conducting research on optimizing alloy properties.

A unique Sonoro Sphere has emerged recently, and Shilang discovers that the alloys he has forged possess exceptional abilities in this domain.


✦Duration✦

2024-09-16 10:00 - 2024-09-28 03:59 (server time)


✦Rewards✦

Astrite x500, Malleable Elite Class Echo I x1, Malleable Elite Class Echo II x1, Premium Resonance Potion x20, Premium Energy Core x10, Premium Sealed Tube x10, and other materials.


✦Eligibility✦

Reach Union Level 14.


✦Details✦

- In each level there will be special buffs. Choose your Resonators wisely to gain additional advantage in combat.

- You can select the difficulty and the reward rate before you start each challenge.

- Earn points by defeating enemies. If you reach the point requirements within the time limit, you will receive completion rewards. You can also claim point rewards once your total points reach the target amount.

- If you have any unclaimed rewards when the event ends, you can log in within 30 days afterward to receive these rewards via mail.
